message.raw:
Fix an issue with output folder. Updating was asynchronous and so the wrong
folder could be used if engage clicked twice rapidly (even though the shots
would have the corect filenames). Further, the updating thread could crash
if the zlock server goes down momentarily. Now it just prints a warning and
doesn't crash.

message:
Fix an issue with output folder. Updating was asynchronous and so the wrong
folder could be used if engage clicked twice rapidly (even though the shots
would have the corect filenames). Further, the updating thread could crash
if the zlock server goes down momentarily. Now it just prints a warning and
doesn't crash.
